name: Peanut Brittle
author: Annita Layton

ingredients.name: c. corn syrup, light or dark

instructions: Combine sugar, syrup, water and salt. Cook and stir until sugar dissolves. When syrup boils, add butter. Stir frequently till thread stage (230°). Add nuts at soft crack stage (280°) Stir until hard crack stage (300°). Remove from heat. Stir in baking soda. Pour into 2 greased cookie sheets.
